docs.snippet: Republicans are trying to find a balance between expressing support for Mr. Trump and distancing themselves from a candidate who may become toxic to the moderates and independents they need to win....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans are trying to find a balance between expressing support for Mr. Trump and distancing themselves from a candidate who may become toxic to the moderates and independents they need to win.
docs.abstract: Republican candidates in New York State elections cautiously navigate course between supporting their party's presidential nominee Donald J Trump and distancing themselves from his polarizing behavior; unique election cycle upsets analysts' traditional expectations about how different regions will vote.

headline.main: G.O.P. Hopefuls in New York Races Walk Tightrope on Donald Trump
